name: Lucky Froggy
description: Welcom to Lucky Froggy on this you are going to put your luck to the test, Froggy is in danger the platforms under him are slowly disapearing and he is getting attacked by those evil rockets. Every 5 seconds you will be able to roll the dice and it will decide how many platforms are gonna be added to Froggy each time also use the gun to take out the deadly animes before they hit you! Good Luck!
